overview: Luna (35), a filmmaker, arrives to find her last belongings at Consuelo's (41), her ex-partner and visual artist, with whom she used to live and with whom she has just ended a six-year relationship. The encounter between the two inevitably leads them to delve into the wounds left by the separation and how to deal with their relationship with Almendra (8), Consuelo's biological daughter, who has grown up with two mothers. Will they be able to reach a consensus, or will this meeting turn into a final farewell?
title: El puzzle que no armaremos
